channel.title: Comments on: It’s Only Teenage Wasteland

item.title: By: angelina jolie
item.dc:creator: angelina jolie
item.description: I love your site. :) Love design!!! I just came across your blog and wanted to say that I've really enjoyed browsing your blog posts.
item.content:encoded: I love your site. ðŸ™‚ Love design!!! I just came across your blog and wanted to say that I’ve really enjoyed browsing your blog posts.

item.title: By: sandrar
item.dc:creator: sandrar
item.description: Hi! I was surfing and found your blog post... nice! I love your blog. :) Cheers! Sandra. R.
item.content:encoded: Hi! I was surfing and found your blog post… nice! I love your blog. ðŸ™‚ Cheers! Sandra. R.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
heh, <a href="http://forums.worldofwarcraft.com/thread.aspx?fn=wow-general&t=2547809&p=1&tmp=1#post2547809">is this you</a> AnalSpellingNazi?
I feel so out of the loop. All these years, I'm pronouncing all the fantasy nomenclature incorrectly like an idiot.
item.content:encoded:
heh, is this you AnalSpellingNazi?

I feel so out of the loop. All these years, I’m pronouncing all the fantasy nomenclature incorrectly like an idiot.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
heh, bet you wish you could go back and edit that, huh? ;)
Some sources say the plural form is shaman. I'm willing to concede that whatever the hell someone wants to use for multiple shaman is ok with me. Usually I use .. wtf and dammit when in their vicinity.
EDIT: Also, I use to pronounce necromancers as NEE-cromancers and shaman as SHAY-man, until I was corrected YEARS LATER on TeamSpeak. So it's clear that I'm no expert in arcane lore and terminology.
item.content:encoded:
heh, bet you wish you could go back and edit that, huh? ðŸ˜‰

Some sources say the plural form is shaman. I’m willing to concede that whatever the hell someone wants to use for multiple shaman is ok with me. Usually I use .. wtf and dammit when in their vicinity.

EDIT: Also, I use to pronounce necromancers as NEE-cromancers and shaman as SHAY-man, until I was corrected YEARS LATER on TeamSpeak. So it’s clear that I’m no expert in arcane lore and terminology.

item.title: By: The Roman Anal Spelling Nazi
item.dc:creator: The Roman Anal Spelling Nazi
item.description: Actually, the currect plural form of shaman <em>is</em> shamans. Kinda surprising that that someone who types "gud" will know that, but there you go.
item.content:encoded: Actually, the currect plural form of shaman is shamans. Kinda surprising that that someone who types “gud” will know that, but there you go.

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description: I've got <a href="http://decendantsguild.com/gallery/union_wow/unionat213br" rel="nofollow">too damn many alts</a> myself. If I had stuck with my Paladin instead of levelling my Hunter she'd be 60 by now.
item.content:encoded: I’ve got too damn many alts myself. If I had stuck with my Paladin instead of levelling my Hunter she’d be 60 by now.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
Ahh Alts-Anonymous - love that. :)
What's even funnier is listening in on the Barrens chat - prime example of the blind leading the blind.
So cute (PvE server here too) when Alliance hits Xroads, and some ambitious teen-level Horde tries to drum up a raid to "retaliate at Astranaar!"
Shine on you crazy diamond.
item.content:encoded:
Ahh Alts-Anonymous – love that. ðŸ™‚

What’s even funnier is listening in on the Barrens chat – prime example of the blind leading the blind.

So cute (PvE server here too) when Alliance hits Xroads, and some ambitious teen-level Horde tries to drum up a raid to “retaliate at Astranaar!”

Shine on you crazy diamond.

item.title: By: Kill Ten Rats » Blog Archive » My Alt Has An Alt
item.dc:creator: Kill Ten Rats » Blog Archive » My Alt Has An Alt
item.description: [...] Tiring… My Alt Has An Alt Foton over at AFK Gamer recently posted about people with Alt Addiction. And I quote: Some players are freak [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Tiring… My Alt Has An Alt Foton over at AFK Gamer recently posted about people with Alt Addiction. And I quote: Some players are freak […]

item.title: By: Ethic
item.dc:creator: Ethic
item.description:
<blockquote>Some players are freaking addicted to alts. They never max-level anything, just screw around with one of their 8 or 10 characters until even they, themselves, realize they're an embarassment to the guild.</blockquote>
Hmm, that is so like me it is frightening.
item.content:encoded:
Some players are freaking addicted to alts. They never max-level anything, just screw around with one of their 8 or 10 characters until even they, themselves, realize they’re an embarassment to the guild.

Hmm, that is so like me it is frightening.
